scripts.dev: concurrently -n "BACKEND,FRONTEND" -c "blue,green" "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.start: concurrently -n "BACKEND,FRONTEND" -c "blue,green" "npm run start --prefix backend" "npm run start --prefix frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix backend && npm run build --prefix frontend
scripts.install: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend
